node.title: Police ID body found in 1992 as teen, now "focus on finding her killer "

node.title: Russia says Moskva warship has sunk, after Ukraine said it hit the flagship with missile strike

node.title: First interstellar meteor to hit Earth confirmed
node.description: Harvard researchers are 99.999% certain the object was interstellar. But their paper on the finding was being turned down, because the pair only had a private conversation with an anonymous U.S. government employee to confirm the accuracy of the data.

node.title: 'It isn’t getting better': More than $8 million gambled away in South Waikato in a year
node.description: A staggering $8 million was lost on pokies in South Waikato between 2020 and 2021, with a "devastating impact on families".

node.title: Twitter CEO tells employees company not 'held hostage' by Musk offer - source

node.title: Police search Taupō forest after gun fired at routine vehicle stop
node.description: A search is underway in a Taupō forest after a man fired a gun at police during a routine vehicle stop early this morning.

node.title: Children who received expired Covid-19 vaccine still protected - medical advisor
